name: Distance of Heaven
description:
Be a God! Show your almighty to the people! Use Wild Fire! Flood! Meteorite! Thunder! and Rain? Help(???) the people to gain faith! However the distance from heaven to earth is too long, so your must suffer from the delay...

Producer & Designer: Godfrey_Y   

Programmer: Godfrey_Y,cqd   

3D Art: Rxa, Little-Rain   

2D Art: Little-Rain, LucasQiao   

Cridit for some rock assets and a tree asset: Stylized Forest pack from UE market place by TomakGS

Tips:

You are playing as a almighty God,

but you are weakened because of the WI-FI latency from heaven to earth.

Your abilities will take some time to show up.

House, Farm, and Temple will provide Faith per second,

while Forest Ruin and House Ruin will reduce the Faith per second.

Your abilities, when doing good, or creating miracles, will increase Faith,

while doing bad will decrease Faith.

P.S: WASD for move, QE for turn, Mouse Left for pick and use ability, Mouse Right for Cancel

P.S.Again： We certainly want to make this game's system more entertaining and causing more chaos, but unfortunately we run out of time (we are mostly based in China). We intent to make this game better even after this event. We will post notification when newer version is available. 

V1.1: Noticed that this game is too confusing. Updated some words to guide players. itch,io link available. GMT 04/06/2022 01:20
